snippet.title: Dark Seal 2 / Wizard Fire - Full Game Playthrough (Not MAME) / ダークシール II / 다크 실 2
snippet.description:
Game Setting :Japan Version. Dip SW 2 No 1,3,5 : ON
(Life : Most / Rank : Easy / M.Gause : Fast / Auto Fire PCB Attached.) 
I have found that this is not the factory setting after cleared the game. T.T.
So, I will try again under the [Factory setting] later.

This video has been recorded from My Arcade PCB.(Not MAME)

[Recording Environment]

For Recording : 
Arcade PCB(RGB output) → RGB Splitter(SEGA/For adjust the RGB signal strength) → Framemeister (RGB Input, HDMI Output) →  Game Capture HD II (HDMI Input+Audio, HDMI Output) → LCD Monitor(LG)

For Playing : 
Arcade PCB(RGB output) → RGB Splitter(SEGA/For adjust the RGB signal strength) → LCD Monitor(TX133019 / 15Khz Direct in)
